title: Patrol finds their first carbon trail eMTB with the new E-Five for 2022
content:
Patrol is powering up for more trail adventures in 2022. Building off their E-Zero and E-Six e-bike range, the company is adding their first ‘trail’ eMTB—and it happens to be carbon fiber. Following their naming structure, the E-Five has roughly five inches of rear travel. Or 130mm to be exact. To get there it uses

The post Patrol finds their first carbon trail eMTB with the new E-Five for 2022 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
